pullRequest.title: Endpoints to get public keys for JWT verification (z/OSMF and Zowe)
pullRequest.bodyText:
This pull request to publish two endpoints to get public keys. Those could be used to verify JWT tokens to check if they are valid:

all (all, which can be used. It means Zowe and z/OSMF together)
current (public key corresponding to the private key which now sings JWT. It can return theoretically multiple keys if Zowe uses z/OSMF token)

Keys are represented as JWK, resp, JWKSet (an object with one attribute keys).
Documentation PR is zowe/docs-site#1115.
Signed-off-by: Pavel Jareš pavel.jares@broadcom.com

nodes.bodyText: may I ask why long path?
May I ask why you prefer inheritance to test class, you can simply test by creating Setter method for useZosmfJwtToken. So basically this field has protected access level only for test?
